title: Modern Car Club Logo in TX
content:
This image is a logo of a car club in Texas. The font is unknown.  
It should be noted that the T,H, and P are capitalized while the X is lower case.

The four letters in the logo are TxHP.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317162315im_/http:/typophile.com/files/photo_6565.JPG)

Font: 

 New Berolina 

Solved By: 

 [kthomps5](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317162315/http:/typophile.com/user/175823 "View user profile.")

author: Will G

comments.content: Sorry, I don't know why it blew it up so big but the original jpeg is attached as well.
